6geGmL8uNEZ4Qt25VM3eeg.text: One word, DELICIOUS.... I got the lasagna, yams and cornbread. Lovely establishment, the staff was friendly and helpful. Would have given it 5 stars but felt like they could have given more lasagna (one layer) for the price ($13.13 not worth the money), and I got two plates with one fork smh. Not good when you and your people on the go, but mistakes happen  I will be returning back, therefore I do recommend all to come and give it a try if you don't mind paying adult prices for a kids plate.

eeW2DIfvJ7dsjtba2uuBxA.text: We loved our food at this small take-out restaurant in the University area. I had the peanut stew with cornbread and it was delicious! Husband got the drumsticks and mac n cheeze. The drumsticks were amazing, perfectly crunchy with a great seasoning. These drumsticks are a game-changer, great for vegans and carnivores! Staff had a delightful energy and super friendly. We will definitely be back!

yZ7gaaVYC-fU8uKyG3fHUQ.text: The food is WONDERFUL. The vegan lasagna, the smothered chicken with rice and the macaroni and cheese were amazing. I'm not even vegan and it was some of the tastiest food I've ever had. There's also a drink they make with kale, lemon, ginger and cane sugar that was amazing. The owners were also super friendly. It was a great experience and I will be making this a regular place to eat.

KGg74mnjgF_zvlfZt8daUA.text: I experienced Veltree for the first time tonight. By the time I got there most of the items I wanted to try were already sold out. I ended up ordering Chik'n & Waffles with a side of Spinach. Other than baby spinach on a salad or sauteed, I don't order cooked spinach at restaurants but based on all of the positive reviews, I decided to go for it and not disappointed. Although I had read all the rave reviews about the drumsticks, I was still hesitant about eating the chik'n. I bit into it and it was actually good! The only downside to the meal is that the drumstick was waaaaay over cooked, however, I will definitely make a return visit to try other items on the menu.

mg-viGl1CN3cM4nrH4Zy5g.text: I didn't know what to expect, but we ordered the Thursday special, pepper steak with rice and gravy, and it was delicious!!!   They give you plenty of food, too.   I didn't care much for the cornbread.  It was too sweet for my tastes, but I really enjoyed the entree.   Even more important the people there were all super friendly!   Love this little place and I will be going back!

uv1X1H_6UnMVtINLKukdsw.text: Food is amazing. Food is DELICIOUS. Food is exceptional. Staff is amazing. Really makes one consider a consistent plant based diet. P.S. tell them it's you're first time your first time there!

jYP4RM2R4wOZeu5ynaV3nw.text: Absolutely Amazing!! I had the salmon patties, Mac and veggies all of it was perfect. The device was out of this world great too. I definitely will be back!!!!! I've have mAny vegan dishes from restaurants around Charlotte but this has to be the best. REAL VEGAN SOUL FOOD!!! Best in Charlotte NOW!!!!

UGJqqTwzKz1q4gb64E8-wA.text: I took one bite of the chick and waffles entree and immediately gave them a shout out on their social. Never had better vegan soul food!

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States

aIp5niqM5chvXpsbl9EZsQ.text: Customer service was excellent and the food was great and flavorful. They only serve certain dishes on certain days. I had the burger and fries and fell in love

XOK1qa7f7SAQFGuNREPwxA.text: my 7th trip to veltree in 2 months.... been ready to get back after my 20 day cleanse!! soooo ready for that food! i'm here and it smells great !! ram con clt,  nc

mzI2ecZTEtHLqholsqTNSQ.text: I was pumped about this place but I was disappointed. I cook vegan all the time. When I go out to eat, I want something special and I did not find that here. The Mac and cheese was bland and rubbery. The waffle was just okay. I would eat here if I was hungry and in the area but I would not make a special trip for it. I almost feel like we vegans have lowered our expectations so we can find something to eat. I am not though. It is just "okay".

MPF2qa6BnKTwhfc82t4j5w.text: Just visited Veltree, the food is absolutely amazing and its soul food. I got the Salisbury steak over rice with green beans and cornbread, everything was seasoned well. They even let you try it before you buy it. I was really impressed. They are so welcoming there so give them a try. Well wishes to Veltree!!

OvCEsQxw84HeuCYyjhqHZQ.text: Being someone that tries to have a plant based diet as much as possible is really hard where I live in HP. However, I just happened to be in Charlotte on an errand and was starving thus prompting the Yelp search for food. Lo and behold, Veltree was .1 miles away. Walking in was an absolutely fantastic experience! I was greeted kindly, and when I told them it was my first time, the entire staff (cooks included) welcomed me with cheers. What a welcome, indeed! The energy alone would have made up for average tasting food, but the lack of indoor seating really drives home the sign outside; "vegetarian take out." Out of the options of the day and after being given a free sample of cheesecake (order a piece, just do it), I went with chick'n and waffles, black eyed peas, mac and cheese, and a red velvet cupcake. After the time I spent waiting for my order, I literally was wanting to put in an application myself to work with such gracious presences. But, on to the food.  Hands down, I cannot tell you any place that I have ever eaten at that had better black eyed peas. The best are there. Order them. The red velvet cucpake was not over the top with sweetness, but was a perfect light hint of red velvet that did not feel heavy at all. That mac and cheese? Heavenly. Chick'n and waffles? Honestly, I ended up eating them separately because the waffle had its own great flavor. I am so happy to see something like this just an hour away, and will be going back.

7w5gxut3xTR57yvf8QOW1w.text: I had the cheeze burger (opted for it to be wrapped in lettuce), curry veggies and spinach. The food was good and hot, the service was great and speedy. I'm stuffed and will be back here again!

RldHhUodfFl_jkGzEUMghQ.text: Loved my experience with Veltree. We were treated with a smile and the cashier was patient with explaining different things about the menu. I had the drum sticks and they were amazing! Mac and cheese was bomb too. Even my non-vegan parents were impressed. Would definitely eat here again!

UJZ4YlM7hvCXOode9Ah_zQ.text: OMG! First let's start with the renovation it's looks amazing! The owners came out and wanted to know our names and they are a beautiful embodiment of southern hospitality and what's missing in the restaurant industry. Get there early they had sold out twice that day  and I thought I was only getting a few sides and lemon pound cake because they were out of the fried chicken   but by some black girl magic they manifested another order and it was EPIC!!!! Loved that it was a different base than I am use to. Could have eaten like 50 nuggets  Thank you so much ladies you made my day! Loved the yams! My love got the curry stew and also enjoyed it! We even got a private tour of the lounge! We will be back to try more of your magic!

jGqpkIQG1cZpeYiXWXhs9A.text: The staff was super friendly and knew everyone that walk through the door. I got the meatless lasagna and the Mac and cheese I was absolutely delicious! My food was ready in minutes i will be returning!!

PHWKZsOkCBe_2Ilhs-uv-A.text: Food was amazing. Owners were very friendly and personal. 10/10 experience. And everything is vegan

9QdLtJVqrTxeW1fG7pnBqA.text: Very impressed with this new takeout spot. All of my food was made fresh and the wait wasn't long at all. The staff was very friendly. Beautiful artwork all over the restaurant. The vegan lasagna tastes like the real deal and they incorporated greens into the recipe. The Mac and cheese was good although I prefer more texture with nutritional yeast. Also, I love the fact that they offer soy free options and desserts. Will definitely be back again!

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Vegan lasagna and Mac and cheese
Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States

Z0SKkUQMbEv5-1jKGDoMOw.text: Overpriced chicken and waffles. Single piece of chicken for 12 dollars???...I dont know about you, but I feel robbed. The taste wasnt special either.

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Overpriced chicken and waffles

Fy0k9R3nG1MB1dIsNHL7TQ.text: Highly recommended! Great convenient location. Food is simply amazing!! Baked crab cake with yams and vegan Mac and cheese. Restaurants like this make it so easy to transition into a Vegan lifestyle! Be mindful that they are closed on Sunday and Monday!

i-TpgBNwTYjzz460fZ04eg.text: Best Vegan food in the Charlotte area! The customer service was friendly and genuine.  The Lasagna was hot and full of favor... Definitely stop in and support this gem!

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States

nDzkjGGbfRCNPFBIxAxMRA.text: Good food and service. Staff very pleasant. I had the jerk chick'n my hubs had the chicken drumsticks.. they give you good portions. we were both satisfied. Thanks Veltree.

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. This meal was plated at home lol.. but food was good:-)

i3NfEYZHw7OjHo0XyQY8cw.text: I placed a to go order over the phone which did require me to give my card information, however, it wasn't that big of a deal. I was told that my burger will be ready within the next 15 minutes, surprisingly I got a call about eight minutes later saying that my food was ready. I thought "how cool is that" for them to give me a call instead of me waiting outside. When I got inside I was greeted, it was clean, and the service was great. Now, the bacon, chili and cheese burger was the best vegan burger I've ever had. Honestly, I want to go back and get dinner.

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Bacon cheeseburger with chili

c_wQ8mtrqJeBJgm0TvPCfQ.text: They are very friendly! Food is good but I will say that for the money you do get pretty small portions of food. They definitely have made improvements to the menu. When they first opened my boyfriend ordered black eye pea soup with rice. Thinking he would get soup. But it was literally peas over white rice. He wasn't very happy. But Ive convinced him to try it again.  I like it! It would nice if they opened a location where you can actually sit and eat. But until then. This works.

mOqUylpgMTEXyCJGumPXmg.text: I was so pumped about Veltree. I went in today the atmosphere was amazing, everyone was nice. But they fell short on the menu, amount of food and prices for me. First the items on the menu is broken up in days, I feel like all side items should be a daily not I have to come back in a week to try different sides. Second, every side has its own price, I know somethings are obvious to price different like if you want a extra side, but one side or two should come with each meal automatically(this would help with pricing). Lastly, Price. I paid $10.00 for chic n waffles, my waffle was huge and I receive 3 smaller than a chicken nugget size chickens. I did ask is that how many come in the order and they said "Yes". So I was disappointed in that. I feel if your going to serve it like that you should have a nugget for each waffle angle to even enjoy it. I only ate half of my waffle because I saw no point in eating it without chicken.  I'll come back and try another day or I'll just come back for the chicken and make everything else at home cause it's just not worth the price for each side. They didn't have nothing fresh or cleansing like fruit or cold salad, or fresh drinks.  Overall it was a nice place, great people.  May need a better prepping system so they serve more sides daily. And really, atleast 2 more chicn with waffles or cut the waffle in half and mark down the price because the ratio is off.

efk6b-j7hS2AMlBTgsXMEQ.text: Veltree is my Favorite vegan place! Even if you're not vegan, you don't miss meat because their food is so flavorful. Their meat substitutions are impeccable, and let me tell you about their customer service! Their customer service is out of this world. I took my wife for her birthday, and they all sang to her!!! We're always greeted by multiple staff members, and everyone always has a smile on their face. I love Veltree

HWKsEtZQA1U_AuVTyhGP0g.text: Veltree is one of my favorite restaurants in Charlotte. They offer a wide variety of vegan dishes. My favorite dish is the salisbury steak with rice. The staff is just as amazing as the food is which is a bonus.

wMLdYZgZPqu1O8TpAZZM6g.text: Awesome food. Especially the Burger with bacon, chili, and cheese. The drum sticks are so good. Great customer service. You can't go wrong with Veltree.

kPp2V3a9bEjKudCHO-kLAQ.text: The jerk chic' band rice is bomb. The customer service is amazing and Shola was AMAZING!

KQxMEWg_axCk-fa2QJbNjA.text: We've been following their Instagram account for about a month now, and finally made it over for lunch today. First off, it was packed out, which is always a good sign. It was a bit of a wait for our food, but the customer service was excellent and the food was well worth the wait. We both got the cheeseburger; I got mac & cheese for my side and my husband got the fries (I *might* have snuck a few). Absolutely delicious, and really really good vegan food. I am really excited about this place, and look forward to coming back again to try the drumsticks or the chick'n and waffles!!! A perfect new addition to the food scene in Charlotte!

49dprw7WI-ehmq7PDI1JEg.text: Very helpful with the menu, friendly n fast! Simply delicious!!Will def keep coming back!

zt3fbifd4dvM9MvTLrOEcw.text: We just left Veltree and the food was AMAZING!!! We ordered the vegan smothered chic'n with rice, vegan cornbread, two orders of vegan drumsticks, and two Izzy drinks. I couldn't wait to eat! We backed out of the parking space and backed up into another one so we could devour our food. The aroma was soooo relaxing. It reminds me of comfort food of course vegan comfort food there is just no other way. We will definitely be returning to Veltree this month! Thank you for the warm welcome.

1telMgvRxU1I2TZBijokqQ.text: Love this place! Food is always good and the staff is always very friendly! You won't regret it!

q07SOcHOJhApKMjq9ii90w.text: I want to be upfront. I'm not a vegetarian but I am open to trying new things. Occasionally I'll shoot for a meatless Monday or what not but nothing past that. Most vegetarian food/restaurant  was either blah or blah from the frozen food section. Well! This spot, this spot right here no no this spot...this spot has flavor ! It makes no sense. I think it's some spell they cast over you. Goodness the food is good...good portions too. Listen, I'm from the North and I've always said that this region is sort of a culinary desert. Veltree is turning that idea around...with no meat mind you! I'm not kidding, you've GOT to try this food its hasnt disappointed.

fC0BPFwvrtglQyljYqmM1w.text: After several recommendations to try this place we did. Let me just say Veltree, where have you been all my life? Let's talk about vegan soul food with a twist! The food was amazing, I'm speechless! Delicious! The cheeseburger tasted like nothing I've ever eaten before, the flavor had me wanting more. My husband ordered the drumsticks and to his surprise they were "very good" the creativity & thought process they've put into making this vegan food taste so good will have you coming back for sure! I have to let you know it's take out only. They do have a dine in area but it is by reservations only from what I was told by the nice lady at the counter. Pricing is reasonable our meal was about $27 including drinks for two. I do hope they plan to expand & some point have a dine-in area. My final note & the reason I didn't give them a five. Parking wasn't ideal, we had a little trouble finding the restaurant and no place to sit and enjoy your meal. However, after experiencing the atmosphere & the food at Veltree, we'll definitely be back!!

lKRCBDDXcYaZqasPj4Rzhg.text: Im not a vegan but I enjoy trying different kinds of food. This spot is cute but really small. There is NOT a dining in option as there are only a few benches to wait for your order. The food was tasty but portion size is small compared to the price. Would I return?, probably not. It was fun for a one time visit.

8Ej-1615euVtEDpkrGITow.text: My favs are the Salisbury steak and jerk chicken! Great food, great people, and great prices compared to other vegan places in Charlotte! Highly recommend to both meat eaters and non-meat eaters!

52nyyrkjGl1-r0_-uG_Dyg.text: It's great food and tasty. I've eaten the chick'n Alfredo with yams and cabbage. Filled me up. Didn't make me feel sluggish after. All flavors were done just right. I'll always return and support.   Certain menu items available daily.  Others in a specific day. But I can say you won't be left unsatisfied.   Will take pics before I finish the plate next time.

dlQKFkfg-W4UUfsYaLX8sA.text: Chicken was good as I heard or saw on Facebook. Customer service was great, the ladies were very friendly. I took away a star because they forgot our cornbread and the mashed potatoes were a little gooey other than that I liked it

PhhYhcTAdtwpA6ZmIVlbFg.text: Wow!   This food was AMAZING!  Veltree is a new vegan take-out place in the University area of Charlotte.  My daughter is vegan and recommended it and I am glad she did.  They run a limited menu (2-3 entrees/2-3 sides) a day so check out their website first to see what they are serving.    I had the salmon patties and they were so good....flavored so well. In fact as good as any salmon patties i have had....but not as fishy....imagine that?  My daughters both had the jerk chicken and it was also very tasty.  We all had the mac and cheese (daughter did a double order) and was equally great.  The ladies who run it are extemely friendly and offered samples before we ordered.  This is a "to go" place but they do have a room a few doors down in the building they are in where you can dine.

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States

KRk7kh0Xzzu3FUGAz-w-9Q.text: I did not feel particularly welcome. I'm not 100% sure why, but others were served before me and got their food before me even though my order was more simple and I arrived first. I have my assumptions as to why, but will keep it private.  I still gave them a shot. I had the wings, collards, and Mac and cheese. The collards are good, but the wings were overcooked and the "meat" was mushy. The Mac and cheese did not have much flavor and is not better than what I can make at home.  The kicker is that I had a full night of diarrhea. Lovely. Obviously will not be back.

WXEDg_9Ro6mAH_DSRhUukg.text: If I could give this place 10 stars I would. I absolutely LOVE this place ! I ordered the chicken drumsticks ( SO GOOD) and Mac and Cheese. Both of them were good! The staff is so friendly and welcoming. It took me about 10 minutes to get my food, which isn't bad at all.

dudgmhLlxfA_A-3kf--iVg.text: Delicious vegan soul food! Thank you so much for giving the vegan and vegetarian community more options. Everything I've had here is delicious

tzrvHbLiumcaYglf0nskUg.text: So the energy here is AMAZING first of all. Second of all the food is just great. I'm not even vegan but I love their food. I've had the vegetable curry over rice, yams (the best), Mac & cheese, "chicken" drumsticks, and something else that I'm sure was good but I can't remember right now. Either way I'd say it's def worth the drive! Literally drove 1.5 hours to get it and it's a carry out only restaurant. Def gotta stop there every time I'm in Charlotte

x6o3LL6mYCnvU91nW5YnFw.text: This is the top spot to go for a vegan food in Charlotte black owned women empowered !!! Chicken drumsticks are off the hook you wouldn't even miss real chicken. You feel like family when you walk through the door. Everything is excellent thank you!!

6Cc5Rj5LlXRSfxm2CZO8vQ.text: Had a great experience at Veltree passing through Charlotte on business . I ordered the empanadas and Mac and cheese with a chocolate chip cookie and ill were amazing . The wait was retry quick .Staff was fun and friendly and welcome all newcomers in the best manner. Def would recommend anyone to stop and try this place .

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Empanadas and Mac and cheese
Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Chocolate chip cookie

WCwgerP70OBWWFDWWcAo4w.text: Wow!!! What can i say, great spot, great service and black owned! It was very clean and i felt right at home. The staff was helpful and i can't wait to come back! Top 10 vegan spots in the city!

e2onBQbgVbS-uFyL5eHOEQ.text: Awesome food and awesome service 100% of the time!! Ordered jerk chickin and yams today and was out of this world!!!

b3odQ3_nXn-3W_134mmvnA.text: Visited this restaurant for the first time after reading all the reviews on yelp and from Instagram followers. Let me just say that the staff was extremely pleasant and nice. Very good people. I order the cheeseburger (soy free), yams and cinnamon bun. The cheeseburger tasted just like the beyond meat burger that I get from Publix out of the freezer section. Nothing special there. The yams were pretty good. The cinnamon bun was not what I expected. I expected this warm, moist, gooey dessert. Instead I got a hard, cold, dry piece of bread with icing on top. Not very tasty. Maybe I need to try to chicken since that's what I hear most people raving about because I was not impressed with what I got. Oh and my bill was $16.00. Totally not worth it. I will give this place another try but maybe I will try something different.

0z3QR6hpMXcm5cc7lqhVeQ.text: I fully enjoyed the chicken and waffles.. Mac n cheese... and bacon burger... hands down the best vegan bacon burger that I have ever experienced as well as a the vegan chicken bites...everything had it's True authentic taste without jeopardizing not one ounce of flavor..it still gave me that amazing taste that I often look for in vegan cuisine...its an A+ for me

QDdaH-UcxcOA2F8FSdCFtQ.text: All I can say is service was superb & food was outstanding.   I had the vegan lasagna & the vegan cheesecake. They both had amazing flavor, you can tell they take pride in their food. I will definitely be back because they're great !!

4FBmhiDHfeQ69K-xgRBW_Q.text: If you are looking for the most flavorful vegan food please visit Veltree! They are amazing! The food is alway good!! I love it !

n2K1VKDHW8ByUE0tqRrwVg.text: Feb-19 checkin... only could afford to grab a chez-burger and fries. After a short wait pleased to see good many of fries. Only complaint that they need to not be too stingy on the ketchup!!!!!!!!!!! Burger was a little bigger than a slider but still delicious. Wanted to grab a cookie until I discover the price of one. Veltree ya'll dead-ass wrong for that. Many has gone down for their greed. #justsayin

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States

ofPwoh5Lc77ESdtyBi6DXw.text: Excellent vegan cuisine.  I have been there several times and have enjoyed every meal. The 'hot dog' was the weakest meal, but all others have been excellent. Can't go wrong.  The crab cakes were the best!   Looking forward to trying the bacon cheeseburger!

KItcfldKgznORvfGLO9V1w.text: Terrible, overpriced food, stay away & save your money. Went to this place on a friday evening, was slightly disppointed that they only had a limited menu. Anyways, ordered crabcakes with a side of fries and chicken wings. Everything was absolutely stale and food wasn't even warmed up! The seasoned french fries however were the worst fries I have ever eaten in my life. They were dehydrated from sitting too long and tasted like eating wood chips!! I have no idea if they served bad food just to us, because people who ordered even before us were still waiting and we got ours in less than 10 mins. Anyways, overall absolutely horrified and ideally I should have been reimbursed for my meal but I had no energy left to go back there again, just picked up fast food after throwing this whole thing out!!!! Never stepping my foot here again, these people should shamed of serving this kind of food at an overpriced rate!

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Wood chip fries anyone?
Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Wood chip fries anyone?

2tKwpWA2-DjzI7oyTRv8DA.text: Honestly the best vegan food I've ever had. I got the chickn drum sticks and rice with gravy. I was a little sad the mac and cheeze wasn't available but holy cow did the rice convince me otherwise. I was BOMB so full of flavor and mix ins. I loved the drum sticks too, they are so clever and with the bbq sauce make some of the best sticks I've ever had. Even my meat eating boyfriend admitted they were amazing! Tender inside and crispy outside just perfect. The ladies working the counter were also so sweet and made my first experience there so exciting! I wish I lived near Charlotte so I could make this place my regular stop.

So6_EbVXZq9jXRXzLMBQUA.text: I tried Veltree for the the first time today.  I work in Harrisburg. While there are a few restaurants in and near Harrisburg that offer a few vegan options, it seems that the majority of the vegan restaurants in Charlotte are southern protion of the city. So, I was pleasantly surprised to see a new vegan option that I could go to for lunch.  While the place is new to me, the location is not as I used to go to ZiZi's Vegan to Go when it occupied the space where Veltree is located.  I ordered the Chic'n n Waffles and Sweet Potato Cheezecake and because my wait was a bit long, I was offered a free cupcake (chose the red velvet).  The food was heavenly. The Chic'n had the perfect amount of seasoning. The waffle was light and fluffy. And the syrup was the best syrup I've ever had. The cheezecake was to die for. Haven't eaten the red velvet cupcake, yet as I decided to save it for dinner.  The staff at Veltree are great. They are very friendly and make you feel at home as do the fellow customers.   If you are a vegan and even if you are a non-vegan, you should definitely give Veltree a try.  As for me, I will definitely be back to Veltree!

sK-gD3vwEtSoS4rh2gZVyQ.text: First, time here and as per usual excited to try their mac. Cause y'all already know! Lol  So, as I was reading about this spot found out they're a restaurant that changes their entrees per day. So, this day they didn't have the mac.  (lowkey: I was mad lol) But it's all good, their Kale Ginger Lemon made up for it!! That shit was sooooooo good!!!   So my manager and I get their and because we're first timers they make this warm welcome announcement that we are. It was cute, ain't come with nothing, but it was cute. Lol I chose the crab cakes, greens and sweet potatoes. All was soooo good. The crabcakes were flavorful but the consistency was different than what I'm used too. But neither here nor there, it was good! My manager got the ribs with the same sides, now those ribs were poppin!!! Next time, I will get that!!  But definitely favoriting this spot!  The service there is quick and warm. Like I say, that always makes the food better   I would add pictures to this but I was hungry and didnt even think about taking pictures till I was finished.  Blame my stomach y'all, blame my stomach lol

QQvNpPDdqRzZY8T_gsitIg.text: Fairly new black-owned vegan restaurant in the heart of the university area...The most perfect equation I could ask for.  Pros :  The environment is consistently welcoming & I am always given a very friendly greeting   The customer service is always superb & the staff always has a positive attitude  Restaurant is close to my home which is convenient for me   The Fried Chikn is the absolute best vegan fried chikn in Charlotte ! great with hot sauce or bbq   Cons :  Pricing. The prices are extremely to expensive. I am all for spending whatever money necessary on good vegan food, but I am always still hungry after I eat veltree. The pricing to portion ratio is off.  Portions. Sometimes they give a generous side serving amount , and other times they provide you with a serving so small you would think it was a kids portion. The portions are inconsistent.  Menu. Extremely too limited. I know they are still fairly new, but the menu needs some serious revisions and additions.  Restaurant is very warm in temperature. I wanted to cry it was so scorching hot while I waited on my food one afternoon. I was sweating bullets.  Fries. As pictured, these shriveled up, bottom of the bag, sitting under a hot lamp all day, unseasoned pieces of potato I was given, is the dealbreaker for me. I couldn't believe that the cook thought this was appropriate to serve. I can't believe the cashier checked that food and thought it was appropriate to serve. I just can't. I couldn't even walk back in to complain because it was just that terrible. I ate the Chikn and threw those fries out to the nearest dumpster I could find. That was my first time ever trying the French fries. It is also the last time that I will be at VelTree, for a while.   So the fries are what led to this review. I've wanted to review VelTree for a while now, but I wanted to give it my honest opinion. I also wanted to keep in mind that they are still a new restaurant and just them putting in the effort to provide something like this for the community is amazing! I will not give up on them, but I want them to really focus on the growth of the establishment as it seems they've gotten comfortable with how things are being ran. I am going to give them a break for a while. have really really tried to love VelTree, but the inconsistency is to common for me to continue to risk my money. I hope this insight is helpful. I will give them time to improve. I wish VelTree the best.

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Vegan Fried Chikn + French Fries

ylPjOeInJpfXTWqe6l27-g.text: First timer here.... My friends all raved about this place so I stopped over while I was on that side of town . My first thoughts were wow, a vegan soul food spot, different . Today, it was really hot as I waited for my food. It was a little busy. There's a small waiting area but no where to eat.   I ended up ordering the crab cakes sandwich as that was menu for today along with spaghetti. I also got a side of collards. I thought the cakes were actually good, good flavor but of course a different texture , as expected . The kale and collard mix was really bland. I had high expectations for those . The meal also came with two pieces of corn bread.   I really wanted to love it but it just didn't hit the mark for me. Maybe I'll come back and give something else a try .

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Kale and Collards Mix  Cornbread
Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Crab Cakes

iqQmfFz__ba1_FfdLDf-bQ.text: I enjoyed my first visit to Veltree. Of the things I ordered , I  enjoyed the waffles and corn muffin the most. (Yes I'm still eating carbs in 2019).   The Chik'n was new to me, but it wasn't bad. It came on a stick and did not lack flavor.  The yams were also good, not cooked to death.   This is restaurant is take-out only, and located in a shopping center off of North Tryon .  I highly recommend this Vegan spot .

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Chic&#39;n and Waffles
Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Yams &amp; Cornbread

yO860O-dA-B2D0aKFWR-Tw.text: Veltree! Let me tell you, you've made a fan today. I believe i was the most anti-vegan person in the world. I've always preferred the "real" thing.    After today's visit, I've had to eat those words(pun intended). As i walked in i saw several people waiting for their food and was promptly greeted by the staff. They were so friendly and welcoming. After telling the cashier it was my first visit, she yelled to the other staff "we have a first timer!" She was able to tell me about the menu and how each day has a special, as well as the everyday specials.  I chose the two Chick'N legs,  mac and cheeze, and yams. After a short wait i got my food and headed home. That first bite of the Chick'N blew me away. This isn't meat?! It was flavored to perfection, and had a satisfying crunch to the breading. I was an instant fan. Maybe i could do this vegan thing.  The mac and cheeze and yams were delicious as well. Overall, i was very pleased with my visit and hope to be back very soon. Thank you guys for changing my views and providing excellent cuisine.

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Chick&#39;N mac and cheeze, and yams
Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States

RqkReCbBUSkYUY6q5SMYsQ.text: I'm NOT a vegan or vegetarian, but I restrict meat from my diet at times and do a Daniel's Fast a couple of times a year.  As a result, I used to come to ZiZi's or eat at Bean Vegan or even Chipotle to grab some clean, fresh meals.  I wasn't aware Zizi's was no longer until a friend of mine told me they were closed permanently.  So I hopped on Yelp and discovered Veltree!  I went to their IG and FB pages to take a look at their offerings and I was pretty impressed.  I read some great things about them and decided to give them a try as I'm currently on a Daniel Fast and I'm tired of veggie bowls from Chipotle lol.  Their menu isn't the same daily, but it isn't a bad thing- don't let it deter you from coming here.  When I arrived, I was immediately greeted by the employees with a warm welcome.  They were very patient and friendly to answer any questions I had and I placed my order with ease. I ordered the Salisbury Steak over rice, Spinach, Cornbread, and 2 Chic'n Drumsticks (peep the pics).  OMG!!!! It was all so delicious and not lacking in any flavor at all!  Even my sister had to have a few bites of it!! The Chic'N really does tastes like fried chicken!!! The spinach was fresh, not from a can and the cornbread wasn't dry at all.  The gravy and "Salisbury steak" was so savory and delicious, that's all I can think about right now! LOL  When I was there, there was a gentleman that ordered a little while before me and he waited a while for his order and without him even mentioning it or saying anything, the staff noticed it and immediately apologized, offering him a free dessert.  I thought that was a very nice gesture and it shows they are very attentive to their guests. Just off of that alone, I will be returning along with the delicious food I thoroughly enjoyed.  They have Sunday brunch and are closed on Mondays, but they accept ApplePay and are live on DoorDash and UberEats :)  Again, I'm not a vegan or vegetarian, but I'll definitely be back very very soon!

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Salisbury Steak over Rice, Fresh Spinach, and Chic&#39;n Drumsticks!!

LW7dJ8b1XeSTKwIJJIW-2Q.text: Pros:  1) Great customer service 2) Friendly atmosphere  3) Beautiful space   4) Great idea  Cons: 1) Price 2) Portion 3) Not enough fiber in choices 4) Options are too brown need more green options/ Too much starch

H_cio9OjN4e4DwZ0z0X0wQ.text: This spots a little hidden away but it's totally worth the effort. I had the chicken and waffles and despite how crowded it was, we got our food quickly. It was really delicious and next time we're in Charlotte we'll definitely be back.

9a1iv8CVK2kxfFQido1V7w.text: So I have been vegetarian since the start of the year (Slutty Vegan) and I had been hearing so many good things about Veltree so I was attempting to stop thru.  I called and spoke with Tre who advised me that they were closing between 3-5 however she would take care of me really quickly. I was ecstatic and took all of her suggestions when she said jerk chicken and kale greens, I was sold.  They are tucked away in a small plaza across from the Wiki Car wash and "if you get to Walmart you went too far. "  The ambience of the restaurant was very nice and relaxed and made you want to pull up a seat, talk and eat (since they were closed I ate in the car, smell was too good to wait). The food is soo flavorful, not too grainy and filling. You guys have won over a long time customer.   Thanks again Tre for taking my order.  P.S. THIS COOKIE!!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Jerk Chicken, Kale Greens and Vegan Cookie

dFztwUm7mkBH-x0118rupQ.text: CAN I SAY THE BOMB.COM!!   They have the MOST AMAZING VEGAN SOUL FOOD EVER!!  Inside is small it's a take place restaurant. Nowhere to eat but room to sat down as your food is getting cooked. Everyone is supper friendly and nice. When you walk in all the employees say "Welcome to Veltree" and if you are a first timer there the cashier will yell out "1st timer" and again everyone will say "Welcome". I think that's really nice.

jTdNjfkxFADDJTqXPb7RvQ.text: LISTEN, the food is delicious, not much else to really say lol. There are different entree offerings each day with a choice of 1 or 2 sides and there are everyday options! I typically like to order ahead (you have to pay by card over the phone if you do this) because the restaurant itself is not much all of a sit down/dine in place. When you walk in or if you're a first timer, you will definitely feel the energy and love, love this spot!

Y5_i-PxrW5XLR833cFWvWA.text: Came in for the bacon cheez burger...GET IT! Next time I'm getting chili on it.  Yes, I am.

AOR8Mrw9q0eC3Fz5TDTOlw.text: Um. Best place ever! Super friendly staff and super delicious vegan food. Can't wait to go back to try the other dishes.

mP3J1Ikmk7XV3HUrWmJ31A.text: Veltree is a vegan soul food take-out restaurant over in the University area.  Let me start with a full disclaimer::: I am not a vegan in any sense of the word.  I am fully carnivorous and I think that makes this review even more significant.  My girlfriend had been wanting to try this spot so I reluctantly accompanied her, (she issued a couple threats and then dragged me there kicking and screaming).   The first thing that really caught my attention is the design.  As soon as I stepped into this spot, I immediately felt at home.  The colors are warm and inviting.  The art work is super dope.  There are pictures of the Chef with different celebrities.  I felt like I was in a comfortable living, not like I was about to get counter service.  Did I mention the super dope art work?  It's worth mentioning again.  The young man working the counter was remarkably pleasant.  He pointed out that it was obviously my first time in and he took the time to walk me through the menu.  Apparently the menu changes daily.  He then asked what types of foods I liked to eat and he made personalized recommendations.  I chose to go for the Vegan Cheese Burger and I elected to add chili and bacon to the sandwich.  Figured I may as well go all the way.  I also took the liberty of ordering Vegan Chicken and Waffles.  The concept of vegan chicken was a little beyond me.  I consider myself a bit of a chicken and waffle connoisseur, so I had to try it.  I also had a side of the most delicious yams.  I have to admit that I was pleasantly surprised.  The food was well cooked, well seasoned and really packed a lot of flavor.  I had absolutely no faith, but I was actually impressed.  The texture of the burger was a little different, but the flavors were on point.  The chili and bacon was a great addition.  I loved the fries as well.  I washed it all down with a delicious organic soda.  All in all it was a very enjoyable meal and my significant other will not have to drag me there the next time.  I am actually looking forward to a return visit.

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Vegan Chicken and Waffles
Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Some of my favorite celebrities
Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States

K-K3okoT1sH1J-qmL8T9ww.text: This spot is truly a must stop by and check out.  Off the main road, this small quaint take out spot will leave you breathless and wanting more.  Their greeting made me feel welcome, even though they were busy, the acknowledged ME. They beautiful black sistas doing their thang and I loved the fact that they are living their dream. I ordered the bacon cheese burger, fries and mint kale lemonade. The burger melted in mouth without hesitation and the flavor of the fries gave my taste buds a sermon in which I almost gave myself a collection. Now that lemonade, created a whole new meaning of delicious. I enjoyed the first, second and third flavor that erupted simultaneously across the curves of my tongue. My mind rejoiced in pleasure as the verse of a song replays in my head, when can I see you again and when can my heart beat again? Wow!

photos.caption: Photo of Veltree - Charlotte, NC, United States. Just enough to keep you coming back for more

FjI8pSCumksEzM_u0EHpng.text: 8/10 rating B+ First time going 1/5/2019 I ordered the Crab Cakes Cornbread & Yams ($15 plate) The yams were hot but the cornbread and crab cakes were room temperature ):  The texture of the crab cakes were on point along with the flavor! I will give a review on all the items over time.

FzS6cAJ0Bpj8QpyLwDWr3A.text: I have been so eager to try this place and finally was able. Veltree is exceptional all the way around!From the time you enter, you feel the love and positive energy. And the food, oh my! Honestly, it looked so good on my plate I couldn't even wait to get home to eat it. I ate it in my car!! I ordered the curry vegetables and rice. I also had a kale lemonade (not sure if that is the correct name). Ya'll I almost went back inside and ordered more. This is definitely a place I will visit more often. Welcome to the community Veltree. Continue to be awesome at what you do!

zY_99MLOYxnLD1jlJfnP6Q.text: Vegan soul food!  I wish I could give them more stars!  They were super friendly, giving us a warm welcome as first rime customers.  They gave my son a complimentary cupcake when they found out it was his birthday!  We ordered the chic'n n waffles which we all agreed was amazing!  They are to-go only, so we took ours to the park.  If you're vegan, this place is a MUST!  If you're not vegan, give them a try!  They might just turn you!!!

hy0gRoV17HVuM2mwoVBGlQ.text: My husband stopped eating meat several months ago so we're always looking for vegetarian options for restaurants. This place was recommended by a coworker. We popped in on a Saturday afternoon. Here's what you need to know: -food is take out -menu is traditional soul food but all plant based options, nice twist! -menu changes daily and apparently during the day, they ran out of macaroni and cheese after we ordered but we were offered another side -follow them on Instagram to keep up with the daily menu -there was about a 15 minute wait for food and the space is small but everything was hot and fresh -service was great  They asked for patience as they're still new. Definitely going back and anticipating an upgrade to 5 stars. Everything we had was good except I wasn't a fan of the cornbread. Personal choice, I need my sugar in my cornbread.

aBKpw1DDMQKghmHHjCJ3Vw.text: Let's just say I'm here at least 3 times a week! I'm a Personal Vegan Chef and I don't always have time to cook for myself! The food here is beyond amazing and I can eat it every time expecting nothing less of great!! If you haven't been here before and you're new to exploring a Plant Based lifestyle this is your place! Even if you've been Plant Based for awhile, this is still your place!!  The owners are super amazing and welcoming to all that comes in the door..
